mapper.insert: insert into teach.tb_teacher (tt_id, tt_name, tt_subject_id, tt_phone, tt_role,tt_del, tt_created_date, tt_updated_date) values (#{ttId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ttName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttSubjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ttPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ttRole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ttDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttCreatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ttUpdatedDate,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.select: select tt_id, tt_name, tt_subject_id, tt_phone,tt_role, tt_del, tt_created_date, tt_updated_date from teach.tb_teacher
